sense.def:
To be plastered to a surface
pomeni držati se neke površine.

seg.quote: His wet hair was plastered to his forehead.

sense.def:
Kadar je površina
plastered with something
, je z nečim prekrita.

seg.quote: Her back was thickly plastered with suntan oil.
The walls of his tiny shop were plastered with pictures of actors.
